argument.name: units
argument.description: Character. The unit of measurement when using a UI_BITMAP_DRAW(), UI_SCREEN_DRAW(), or UI_PRINTER_DRAW()command. the options are: "pixels", "inches"

page.discussion: The SET_UNITS() function sets the unit of measurement when drawing images in memory. Used only in the Code sections of UI_BITMAP_DRAW(), UI_SCREEN_DRAW(), and UI_PRINTER_DRAW().
